Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Ewing
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ewing & 106th due to, street blockage near 103rd/Ewing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ewing and 106th due to, street blockage near 103rd/Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.
